attributes.action: arrange for Speaker Martin to face a vote of no confidence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Speaker Martin has consistently brought the House of Commons into disrepute as a result of his incompetence and lack of understanding of his duties and office. He clearly has no interest in democracy or the efficient running of the House of Commons. His lack of ability has become a crushing embarrasment to the House and the country at large.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
